1.0.name: wordpress/wp-max-social-widget
1.0.description:
WP Max Social Wigdet : wordpress Social widget having most of the social icon and social bookmarking option .Wp max social widget reside on the sidebar of the wordpress.having social links like : g+,facebook,pinterest,twitter,news feed subscription,dribbble,vimeo,digg,stumbleupon and more.

Version = 1.3.2 = 1.Minor bug Fix

Version = 1.3 =

1.You tube Added.

2.Footer Show/hide Options Added.

Version = 1.2 =

1.Minor Bug Fixed

Version = 1.1 =

1.Adjustable Facebook Subscribe Width/height . 2.Advanced Twitter Options:- * Show/hide username button ,Show/Hide Bubble

Installation Guide:

1.Upload the plugin to your blog and just activate it.

2.Goto your Appearance>Widgets and then Edit its data as per requirement.

More Details & Support

  • Homepage : Web devlopment Tutorials

  • Support Thread:
